heading: HR02429
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE SYNCHRONIZED ENHANCED MANAGING POLICE OPERATIONS (SEMPO) CONDUCTED ON DECEMBER 27, 2018 BY THE COMBINED ELEMENTS OF THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE - SPECIAL ACTION FORCE (PNP-SAF) REGIONAL OFFICE 7 AND THE 94TH INFANTRY BATTALION OF THE PHILIPPINE ARMY THAT RESULTED IN THE KILLING OF SIX INDIVIDUALS AND ARRESTS OF 27, MOSTLY MEMBERS OF VARIOUS PROGRESSIVE ORGANIZATIONS IN GUIHULNGAN CITY AND TOWNS OF MABINAY AND STA. CATALINA, NEGROS ORIENTAL PROVINCE
principal-authors: CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-01-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02429
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE SYNCHRONIZED ENHANCED MANAGING POLICE OPERATIONS (SEMPO) CONDUCTED ON DECEMBER 27, 2018 BY THE COMBINED ELEMENTS OF THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE - SPECIAL ACTION FORCE (PNP-SAF) REGIONAL OFFICE 7 AND THE 94TH INFANTRY BATTALION OF THE PHILIPPINE ARMY THAT RESULTED IN THE KILLING OF SIX INDIVIDUALS AND ARRESTS OF 27, MOSTLY MEMBERS OF VARIOUS PROGRESSIVE ORGANIZATIONS IN GUIHULNGAN CITY AND TOWNS OF MABINAY AND STA. CATALINA, NEGROS ORIENTAL PROVINCE
